title: Anyone Else noticing a ram loss in the pixel 4a , im noticing mine shows 5.4gb ram (3days use )
content: So i have ran geekbench,cpu -Z and a few others to check hardware .. i have only used the phone 3days and have only 3 downloaded apps. However all the benchmarks are showing 5.46gb ram total  with 1.5bg free and not 6gb. Just wondering is that shoddy hardware or something like a system reserve
